name: Daze Monster
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one living creature of 6 HD or less
text: This spell functions like daze, but it can affect any one living creature of any type. Creatures of 7 or more HD are not affected.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘晕眩术 (Daze)’一般，不过它能够影响一个任何种类的活物。具有7个或更多HD的生物不受影响。
